attributes.action: I propose to increase personal allowance for all keyworkers by 8K in 2020/21
attributes.additional_details: Key workers are the real heroes during this very difficult period. This incentive would make them feel valued by our government for taking the risks of staying at work to save the lives of thousands of Brits.
attributes.background: Keyworkers who worked during the COVID-19 outbreak in the UK be given the opportunity to apply for a one off increase of personal allowance for the coming 2020/21 tax year.

rejection.details:
Identify and reward all key workers due to Covid-19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308903

Consider how to compensate key workers for their efforts during Covid-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/308172

Make hazard pay mandatory for key workers in the midst of COVID 19: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

Give all key workers a 100% tax and Nat. Ins. holiday through COVID-19 crisis: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/306845

Pay bonus to all key workers: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307215
